results.title: Undead
results.creator_credit: Peter Spierig, Michael Spierig, Imagine Entertainment (US) and Spierigfilm
results.brief_description: Australian twin filmmaking brothers, Michael and Peter Spierig, have written, produced and directed this, their first feature film. They have achieved their goal of creating a schlock splatter horror with a load of laughs but with a sci-fi alien plot twist that makes it stands out. What also stands out is the finish of the film as its low budget is not that evident in the final outcome. Fictional small Australian country town of Berkeley, renowned for its good fishing, is invaded by aliens that send strange meteors from space turning people into the undead - zombies. The local beauty contest winner Rene (Felicity Mason) is about to leave town but is prevented when her driver becomes victim to zombie attack. The local town loony, a tall silent bloke called Marion (Mungo McKay), comes to her aid with a three-barrelled custom-made rifle. Blood, gore, splatter and laughs aplenty ensue as our hapless heroes (including the swearing town cop and his rookie constable, Wayne and his pregnant girlfriend) go about surviving the onslaught of brain sucking zombies. The aliens appear on earth cleansing some folks with healing rain and they are then ascended to orbit the earth. The ending has the potential for a sequel and hopefully someone will give them the money! This is must see cult classic for those into the schlock/horror or low budget independent genre/s. Crew that deserve special mention are the make-up designer Steven Boyle, cinematographer Andrew Strahorn, composer Cliff Bradley and everyone that worked on the special effects, which includes the directors. (“The Making Of” in the extras is worth a look if you’re thinking of making a low budget feature!) Hopefully there will be more from The Spierig Brothers in the future. SOME SCENES MAY DISTURB.

results.title: Mystic river
results.creator_credit: Clint Eastwood, Judie G. Hoyt, Robert Lorenz and Malpaso Company
results.brief_description: An intense drama from director Clint Eastwood, about three childhood friends whose paths meet in adult life when one of their teenage children is murdered. Sean Penn (Jimmy) plays the anguished father of the murdered girl (winning an Academy Award for Best Actor for his performance), with Kevin Bacon (Sean) as the police detective investigating, and Tim Robbins as the troubled suspect Dave (also an Academy Award winning performance). Based on the novel by Dennis Lehane. Cast also includes Marcia Gay Harden, Laurence Fishburne and Laura Linney.

results.title: Frida
results.creator_credit: Julie Taymor, Roberto Sneider, Lindsay Flickinger, Nancy Hardin, Lizz Speed, Joy Polstein, Salma Hayek, Sarah Green, Ventanarosa Productions and Miramax Films
results.brief_description: Academy Award winning biographical feature about Mexican artist Frida Kahlo. The story unfolds in splendid colour from Frida’s early years, as we watch Frida’s journey to become a recognised artist in her own right.

constellations_other.name: From gallery to screen
constellations_other.description: Explore how famous films, videogames and music videos have taken their cue from the art of the past.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Julie Taymor, Roberto Sneider, Lindsay Flickinger, Nancy Hardin, Lizz Speed, Joy Polstein, Salma Hayek, Sarah Green, Ventanarosa Productions and Miramax Films
results.description: Academy Award winning biographical feature about Mexican artist Frida Kahlo, played by Salma Hayek. The story unfolds in splendid colour from Frida’s early years and follows through to the moment of her death. We witness her struggles in life against traditional society’s perceptions of women, her own physical disabilities and most importantly, her struggle to become a recognised artist/painter in her own right. Cast includs Alfred Molina as Diego Rivera, Antonio Banderas, Valeria Golino, Ashley Judd, Mia Maestro, Edward Norton and Geoffrey Rush. Second disc contains many special features.

results.title: Treasure planet
results.creator_credit: Ron Clements, John Musker, Roy Conli and Walt Disney Pictures
results.brief_description: Walt Disney animated feature based on the novel “Treasure Island” by Robert Louis Stevenson. A dazzling mix with the feel of an old costumed pirate drama combined with space travel adventure. A small boy reads an animated adventure book about pirates on a quest for treasure, all set in space. The sea is replaced by space and the bad pirate is a cyborg, but the story of the personal growth of the young male protagonist is timeless.

results.title: The Spanish apartment = L'Auberge Espagnole
results.creator_credit: Cedric Klapisch, Bruno Levy, Ce Qui Me Meut and Fox Searchlight Pictures
results.brief_description: Written and directed by Cedric Klapisch, “The Spanish Apartment”, a French/Spanish co-production, investigates the issue of whether or not a job makes us who we really are. In the quest to find a steady job, Xavier (Romain Duris) heads off to Spain for a year of post-graduate study leaving his girlfriend (Audrey Tautou) and mother behind in France. He meets a French married couple with whom he develops a friendship, particularly with the wife. Moving into a share-apartment with other students he acquires a broader knowledge of women and life from his friends and their lives there. Not only learning more on Spanish politics and economy he develops his knowledge of the Spanish language. Does he find himself though? Cast includes Judith Godreche, Cecile De France, Kelly Reilly, Christina Brondo, Federico D’Anna, Barnaby Metschurat, Christian Pagh, Kevin Bishop, Xavier De Guillebon.

results.title: It's a very merry Muppet Christmas movie
results.creator_credit: Kirk Thatcher, Warren Carr, Martin G. Baker, Jim Henson, National Broadcasting Company and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: It’s the night before Christmas and the Muppet Theatre is under threat of being demolished. Stars the usual Muppet gang of Miss Piggy, Kermit and others, who all rally and with some divine intervention and funny send-ups of holiday movie cliches, to reveal the film’s message is love will save the day (as well as a good song and dance number!). Humans that also feature are David Arquette, Joan Cusack and Whoopi Goldberg. Directed by Kirk R Thatcher and produced by Martin G Baker and Warren Carr.

results.title: Sweet talker
results.creator_credit: Michael Jenkins, Ben Gannon, New Town Films and New Vision Films
results.brief_description: Con artist Harry Reynolds is released from prison armed with his partners research for a new scam. Harry heads for the dying town of Beachport near the coast of Australia where he cons the locals into investing big bucks into his scam (the recovery of an old ship and the building of a theme park). Complications arise when Harry falls for the local hotel owner Julie and her young son David. Cast includes: Bryan Brown, Karen Allen, Chris Haywood, Bill Kerr, Bruce Spence, Bruce Myles.

results.title: Jimmy Neutron: boy genius
results.creator_credit: Albie Hecht, John A. Davis, Steve Oedekerk, O Entertainment, Nickelodeon Movies and Paramount Pictures
results.brief_description: Computer animated sci-fi story about boy genius Jimmy Neutron who unwittingly causes havoc when a satellite launched by him is picked up by an alien species known as Yokians. These strange green aliens invade Jimmy’s hometown Retroville in the dark of night and abduct all the parents in the town leaving it up to Jimmy, along with his robotic dog, Goddard, his best friend Carl Wheezer and his arch rival Cindy Vortex to take to the skies in a rescue bid to save the parents from becoming human sacrifices. Features the voices of Debi Derryberry, Megan Cavanagh, Mark Decarlo, Martin Short and Patrick Stewart.

results.title: The Sum of all fears
results.creator_credit: Phil Alden Robinson, Mace Neufeld, AZL Productions KG, MFP Munich Film Partners GmbH and Paramount Pictures
results.brief_description: Based on the best-selling novel by Tom Clancy with screenplay by Paul Attanasia and Daniel Pyne, this political thriller revives the tensions and paranoia of the Cold War era between the Americans and the Russians when the CIA suspect that Russia is once again involved in the development of nuclear weapons. Suspense and intrigue follow as a terrorist plot brings the two super-powers to the brink of nuclear war. Starring Ben Affleck as the rather young CIA agent Jack Ryan and Morgan Freeman as CIA Director William Cabot with James Cromwell, Liev Schreiber, Bridget Moynahan, Alan Bates.

results.title: Mission: impossible
results.creator_credit: Brian De Palma, Cruise/Wagner and Paramount Pictures
results.brief_description: Tom Cruise stars in this high action remake of the television series. The film is an action packed, gadget filled blockbuster with twisting plots, glamour and double crossing secret agents. “Mission: Impossible” is a big-production exciting spy thriller. Cast includes Jon Voight, Emmanuelle Beart, Henry Czerny, Jean Reno, Kristin Scott-Thomas and Vanessa Redgrave.
